Text: The goal is to have a smaller bank, but with a more sustainable business model less dependent on capital markets in the long term. To achieve this, Deutsche Bank has decided to create a new Capital Release Unit (CRU), to where it transferred some €74 billion ($81 billion) of risk-weighted assets (RWAs) and €288 billion ($316 billion) of leverage exposure.
Cause: The goal is to have a smaller bank, but with a more sustainable business model less dependent on capital markets in the long term.
Effect: To achieve this, Deutsche Bank has decided to create a new Capital Release Unit (CRU), to where it transferred some €74 billion ($81 billion) of risk-weighted assets (RWAs) and €288 billion ($316 billion) of leverage exposure.
Sentence: <e1>The goal is to have a smaller bank, but with a more sustainable business model less dependent on capital markets in the long term.</e1> <e2>To achieve this, Deutsche Bank has decided to create a new Capital Release Unit (CRU), to where it transferred some €74 billion ($81 billion) of risk-weighted assets (RWAs) and €288 billion ($316 billion) of leverage exposure.</e2>
